document.topic_text: Times Colonist Monday 25th April, 2016 Re: "B.C. takes fight to Metro Vancouver gangs," April 16. This is the same premier who, by August 2014, had cut the RCMP budget so drastically, it was noted by the RCMP the cuts would "lead to staffing reductions in its organized crime and homicide units."
